text: The Great Shake is the fourth studio album by the Italian band Planet Funk, released on 20 September 2011. == Track listing == # All Your Love # Another Sunrise # The Great Shake # How Should I Know # Just Another Try # Live It Up # Ora il mondo è perfetto (feat. Giuliano Sangiorgi) # The Other Side # You Remain Category:2011 albums Category:Planet Funk albums
title: The Great Shake
